trans-unit.source: Represents an import that is required by a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object and that can specify both a contract name and metadata.
trans-unit.target: 代表匯入所需的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>物件，且可以指定合約名稱和中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref> class with the specified contract name, required type identity, required metadata, cardinality, and creation policy, and indicates whether the import definition is recomposable or a prerequisite.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>類別具有指定的合約名稱、 所需的型別身分識別、 必要的中繼資料、 基數和建立原則，並指出是否匯入定義為阻礙或必要條件。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>匯入定義所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type identity of the export type expected.
trans-unit.target: 匯出類型必須是型別識別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*> method to generate a type identity for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*>方法來產生指定型別的型別識別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*>

trans-unit.source: If no specific type is required, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有特定的類型，使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the metadata names and types required by the import definition; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata*> property to an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含的中繼資料名稱和類型匯入定義所需的索引鍵/值組的集合或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata*>屬性設為空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata*>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示的基數<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>匯入定義所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the import definition can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指定匯入定義可以同時滿足多次存留期中的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the import definition is required to be satisfied before a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> can start producing exported objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指定匯入定義，才能滿足之前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>可以開始產生匯出物件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates that the importer requires a specific creation policy for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出，匯入工具會用來滿足此匯入匯出要求特定的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: If no specific creation policy is needed, the default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要特定的建立原則，預設值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: contractName is .
trans-unit.target: contractNameis .

trans-unit.source: contractName is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: contractName為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or- requiredMetadata contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: -requiredMetadata包含的項目是 。

trans-unit.source: -or- cardinality is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: -cardinality不是其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref> class with the specified contract name, required type identity, required and optional metadata, cardinality, and creation policy, and indicates whether the import definition is recomposable or a prerequisite.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>類別指定的合約名稱、 所需的型別身分識別、 必要和選擇性中繼資料、 基數，以及建立原則，並指出是否匯入定義為阻礙或必要條件。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>匯入定義所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type identity of the export type expected.
trans-unit.target: 匯出類型必須是型別識別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*> method to generate a type identity for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*>方法來產生指定型別的型別識別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*>

trans-unit.source: If no specific type is required, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有特定的類型，使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the metadata names and types required by the import definition; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata*> property to an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含的中繼資料名稱和類型匯入定義所需的索引鍵/值組的集合或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata*>屬性設為空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition.RequiredMetadata*>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the cardinality of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示的基數<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>匯入定義所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the import definition can be satisfied multiple times throughout the lifetime of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指定匯入定義可以同時滿足多次存留期中的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the import definition is required to be satisfied before a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> can start producing exported objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指定匯入定義，才能滿足之前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref>可以開始產生匯出物件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates that the importer requires a specific creation policy for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出，匯入工具會用來滿足此匯入匯出要求特定的建立原則。

trans-unit.source: If no specific creation policy is needed, the default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要特定的建立原則，預設值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with this import.
trans-unit.target: 此匯入相關聯的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: contractName is .
trans-unit.target: contractNameis .

trans-unit.source: contractName is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: contractName為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or- requiredMetadata contains an element that is .
trans-unit.target: -requiredMetadata包含的項目是 。

trans-unit.source: -or- cardinality is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: -cardinality不是其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an expression that defines conditions that must be matched to satisfy the import described by this import definition.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義必須滿足此匯入定義所描述的匯入符合條件的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An expression that contains a <xref:System.Func%602> object that defines the conditions that must be matched for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> to be satisfied by an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含的運算式<xref:System.Func%602>定義必須符合之條件的物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>應符合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the constraint represented by this object is satisfied by the export represented by the given export definition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個物件所代表的條件約束是否符合所指定的匯出定義表示匯出所。

trans-unit.source: The export definition to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的匯出定義。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the constraint is satisfied; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果符合條件約束;，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the importer requires a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref> for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出匯入工具需要特定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>用來滿足此匯入的匯出。

trans-unit.source: One of the following values: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>, if the importer does not require a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 下列值之一︰ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"> </xref>，如果匯入工具不需要特定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref> to require that all exports used should be shared by all importers in the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>需要在容器中的所有匯入工具應該共用使用的所有匯出。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref> to require that all exports used should be non-shared in the container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy"></xref>要求所使用的所有匯出應該都是非共用的容器中。

trans-unit.source: In this case, each importer receives a separate instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，每個匯入工具會收到個別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata names of the export required by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 取得匯出匯入定義所需的中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null` or return an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection that contains an element that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個屬性永遠不應該傳回`null`或傳回<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合，其中包含的項目是`null`。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: If the definition does not contain required metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義不包含必要的中繼資料，傳回空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合而。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref:System.String> objects that contain the metadata names of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects required by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref:System.String>所包含的中繼資料名稱的物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>所需物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the expected type of the export that matches this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合此匯出的預期型別<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that is generated by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*> method on the type that this import expects.
trans-unit.target: 產生所呼叫的字串<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*>此匯入預期的類型上的方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetTypeIdentity*>

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, this import does not expect a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，此匯入不會預期特定的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個字串表示<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串表示<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ContractBasedImportDefinition"></xref>物件。
